blog.name: coffeewithkaraa
blog.title: coffeewithkaraa
blog.description: talking about being a student and my love for books, bullet journaling, music, feminism, Becky Albertalli and coffee join me on my way through teenage life with all its struggles and experiences.

title: things to do this autumn
body:
-watch harry potter films (or at least some of them)

-re-read some of your favourite scenes from harry potter

-make a autumn playlist with all the songs that remind you of this lovely season or explore new music

-paint nails in warm colours

-drink looots of warm drinks (such as tea or coffee, new favourite is chai latte cause it taste like heaven)

-wear cozy sweaters and socks

-watch films with your blanket and said hot drink (get all cozy)

-take walks in the rain (and the sun) and listen to the leaves under your feet

-bake cakes/brownies/muffins/anything you want

-use spices realted to this season

-remind yourself of the blessing nature offers you and don’t curse because of the rain

-knit or craft something different

-watch the sun set

-spend time with loved ones at home or in nice cafes (or go to cafes on your own with a good book and your headphones on)

-go to the library or the theatre


as september now finally began, i am actually really excited to welcome the new season although i did not really want summer to end (which is quite unusual), but i cannot prevent autumn from entering anyway, so why don’t we do some things we enjoy (even though school/uni starts soon or has even started for some already). get yourself some treats that make you happy and feel excited for the colder days, it’s gonna be a lovely time

please add your plans for autumn <3 (hoping to at least do some of these and not only drink tea and eat cake and cookies)

summary: I can't watch this without laughing 😂😂😂. Harry just kinda hugs the wall then lies down dramatically as if fainting which is...
body: I can’t watch this without laughing 😂😂😂. Harry just kinda hugs the wall then lies down dramatically as if fainting which is hilarious in itself. But Ron just… hecking goes for it and dives right over his trolley head first 😂😂. Love these two.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

tags: i love punk remus lupin okay?
summary: okay so headcanon that out of school remus lupin is a punk. Like one day he was walking through his muggle town and some member...
body:
okay so headcanon that out of school remus lupin is a punk. Like one day he was walking through his muggle town and some member of a gang tried to beat him up and cause of the whole werewolf thing he just kinda defeated him effortlessly. 

and then the other kids saw and were like woah that kid is cool, he beat brian into a paste and look at his scars wow 

and that is how remus lupin accidentally became the leader of a gang. i mean people still challenged him but remus just kind of gently and cautiously climbed to the top of the leader board of a gang without even knowing it

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary:
MARAUDERS ERA, LONDON TWENTY-EIGHTEEN.

Smokes that billow. Soot that stains. Dust that settles. Gods are now silent as the...
caption:
MARAUDERS ERA, LONDON TWENTY-EIGHTEEN.

Smokes that billow. Soot that stains. Dust that settles. Gods are now silent as the wizarding fragment of London is halved in two, with the oligarchical reign of the Dark Lord in one, and the Order of Phoenix as another inconsequential factor to the equation. The First Wizarding War ended years ago, but it has never meant that the battle is over. It never is.

COMING SOON TO JCINK NEAR YOU: TRACKING #DEIFORMRP.
